title: Family visits jailed Kansas chemist arrested by ICE
text:
Family visits jailed Kansas chemist arrested by ICE Monday, February 26, 2018 - 01:11 
The family of Syed Jamal, a Kansas chemistry professsor, got to visit with him Sunday for the first time since was arrested last month by ICE agents for overstaying his visa. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
